characterInfo.Appears in: Mistborn: The Final Empire, Mistborn: The Well of Ascension, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDetails.Appearance:
He is described as a lithe man with long, drooping mustaches and pale skin. Judging by his eyes, he is thought to have some Shin blood in him.
He is a short man who barely comes up to the middle of Dalinar's chest.
characterDetails.Characteristics:
He is not a secret agent.
When Felt moves he goes by the same name, unlike some other characters in the cosmere such as Zahel and Azure.
characterDetails.Character: He is logical and resourceful. He appears to be loyal to the lords that he serves, and enjoys taking on any tasks to which he is assigned.
characterDetails.Abilities: As a worldhopper, he's been a member of various groups over the years. His motivations and allegiances have shifted at different points in his life, and he has sometimes been a "rogue agent" in the cosmere.
characterDetails.Speculation: There are some readers who think that Felt is the kandra about whom Brandon has spoken that is present on Roshar. One has cited a passage in Mistborn: The Final Empire in which it is indicated that Felt is, notably for his kind, lithe and nimble.
